description: Knowledgebase which contains queries which are frequently used in rules.

queries.name: q_hana_version
queries.sql: SELECT VERSION, substr_before (version, '.') as major, trim (LEADING '0' FROM  substring(substr_before(substr_after(substr_after (version, '.'), '.'),'.'), 2, 1)) as sps, trim (LEADING '0' FROM substring(substr_before(substr_after(substr_after (version, '.'), '.'),'.'), 2, 3)) as revision, CASE when substr_before(substr_after(substr_after (substr_after (version, '.'), '.'),'.'),'.') = '00' then '0' else trim (LEADING '0' FROM substr_before(substr_after(substr_after (substr_after (version, '.'), '.'),'.'),'.')) END as patch FROM M_DATABASE

queries.name: q_hana_nodes
queries.sql: SELECT DISTINCT(HOST) AS hosts FROM M_HOST_INFORMATION

queries.name: q_largest_schema
queries.sql: SELECT SCHEMA_NAME as schema, CAST(SUM(DISK_SIZE) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as varchar) as size, SUM(DISK_SIZE) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 as cmpsize FROM M_TABLE_PERSISTENCE_STATISTICS GROUP BY SCHEMA_NAME ORDER BY CMPSIZE DESC LIMIT 1

queries.name: q_system_usage
queries.sql: SELECT VALUE as value from M_INIFILE_CONTENTS  WHERE FILE_NAME = 'global.ini' AND SECTION = 'system_information' AND KEY = 'usage'
